## Day 2 - Learning goals

- The students are aware of current research on non-alignment of digitalization with regard to sustainability goals.
- The students are aware of proposed solutions.
- The students can relate their own research to questions of sustainable digitalization.

- The lecturer does support creative group work

## Day 2 - Program

- Input: The case for a digital reset
- Reflection: Sustainability in my own research
- Creative group work: Build your own susdigi research project
